cocktails.name: Battle Creek
cocktails.instructions: Shake and double strain into chilled coupe glass, top with honey mascarpone foam, and sprinkle flakey salt on top.

cocktails.name: Little Wild Horse
cocktails.instructions: Smoke sage under upside cocktail glass. While smoking, stir ingredients in mixing glass with cubed ice. Turn cocktail glass right-side up and fill with fresh cubed ice. Strain missing glass, and garnish with dried pina flower and sage leaf.

ingredients.name: Plantation O. F. T. D Rum

cocktails.name: M & M
cocktails.instructions: Stir with ice, strain into chilled coupe with one side dipped in tajin.

cocktails.name: Silver Star
cocktails.instructions: Shake and strain into coupe glass. Kaffir lime leaf garnish.

ingredients.name: Coconut Fat Washed Mi Campo Tequila

cocktails.name: Eagle Nest
cocktails.instructions:
Egg white
shake with ice, then dry shake, strain into frozen glass. Spritz with absinthe. Macha syrup
1 cup sugar
1 cup water
2 spoon matcha
combine in saucepan over medium heat. Stir until sugar is dissolved. Let cool, then pour into a glass container and seal tightly.

cocktails.name: Golden Label
cocktails.instructions: Build in camp mug, garnish with biscoff cookie.

cocktails.name: Dodges
cocktails.instructions:
Whip cream/ micro plane chocolate
build in goblet

cocktails.name: The Bank
cocktails.instructions: Build in goblet. Spritz with cbd oil.

cocktails.name: Red Light
cocktails.instructions: Stir and strain into cocktail glass with cubed ice. Garnish with a bruleed banana.

ingredients.name: Campari Infused Coco Nibs (750 Ml Campri 280 Ml Coco Nibs For 18 Hours)

cocktails.name: Mchenry House
cocktails.instructions: Stir and strain into cocktail glass with cubed ice. Garnish with an orange peel.

cocktails.name: Grizzly
cocktails.instructions: Stir and strain into mason jar with cubed ice. Garnish with luxardo cherries.

cocktails.name: Bogans
cocktails.instructions: Build in collins glass with cubed ice. Top with ginger beer. Garnish with cucumber ribbon and celery leaf bouquet.
cocktails.garnish: Cucumber ribbon and celery leaf bouquet

cocktails.name: Mr. Loverledge & Thorpe
cocktails.instructions: Shake and strain into collins glass with cubed ice. Top of with topo chico grapefruit soda. Garnish with dehydrated grapefruit wheel.

cocktails.name: Capen & Goodrich
cocktails.instructions: Shake and strain into cocktail glass. Top with sour beer (kveik from shades of pale brewing).
cocktails.garnish: Sour beer (kveik from shades of pale brewing)

cocktails.name: The Cozy
cocktails.instructions: Shake and strain into campfire washed coupe. Micro plane chocolate garnish.
